DECLARE @CurrentDate VARCHAR(8) = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) DECLARE @MaxID INT
SELECT @MaxID = MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(a.mm_id, 10, 4) AS INT)) + 1 FROM sm_material_move a WHERE a.mm_id LIKE 'MM' + SUBSTRING(@CurrentDate, 3, 8) + '%'
SET @MaxID = ISNULL(@MaxID, 1)
INSERT INTO sm_material_move ( mm_id, pi_id, mm_in, mm_in_kg, mm_out, mm_out_kg, mm_cnt, mm_cnt_kg, mm_reg_id, mm_reg_date ) VALUES ( 'MM' + SUBSTRING(@CurrentDate, 3, 6) + '-' + RIGHT('000' + CAST(@MaxID AS VARCHAR(4)), 4), #{piId}, CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmIn})), CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmInKg}), CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmOut})), CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmOutKg}), CONVERT(INT, CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmCnt})), CONVERT(FLOAT, #{mmCntKg}), #{userId}, GETDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT mm_id, pi_id, mm_in, mm_in_kg, mm_out, mm_out_kg, mm_cnt, mm_cnt_kg, mm_reg_id, mm_reg_date, mm_edt_id, mm_edt_date FROM sm_material_move WHERE mm_id = #{mmId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sm_material_move SET pi_id = #{piId}, mm_in = #{mmIn}, mm_in_kg = #{mmInKg}, mm_out = #{mmOut}, mm_out_kg = #{mmOutKg}, mm_cnt = #{mmCnt}, mm_cnt_kg = #{mmCntKg}, mm_edt_id = #{userId}, mm_edt_date = GETDATE() WHERE mm_id = #{mmId}
